post.description: Register a new user and generate an API token

post.summary: Login a user and generate an API token

get.summary: Retrieve a booking and its customer info by ID
get.description: Get a booking by its ID, including the related customer info.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to retrieve

put.summary: Update a booking (and its customer info) by ID
put.description: Update an existing booking and its related customer info.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to update

payment_plan_id.description: ID of the selected payment plan for this unit

receipt.description: Optional new receipt file (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png)

delete.description: Delete a booking by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to delete

post.summary: Scan a customer passport to get their information.

document.description: Passport file to extract data from. Accepted file extensions: pdf, jpg, jpeg, png

post.summary: Book a unit by creating CustomerInfo and Booking with status Pre-Booked
post.description: Book a unit with provided customer information and an optional payment receipt.

upload_token.description: Token referencing the previously uploaded passport file

unit_id.description: ID of the unit to be booked

payment_plan_id.description: ID of the selected payment plan for this unit

receipt.description: Optional payment receipt (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png)

post.summary: Upload or replace a payment receipt for an existing booking
post.description: Upload (or replace) a payment receipt for an existing booking.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to upload a receipt for

receipt.description: Payment receipt file (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png)

get.summary: Download receipt or passport file for a booking
get.description: Download either the receipt or the passport document for a specific booking.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of file to download (passport or receipt)

post.summary: Approve a booking (CEO can single-approve; CSO & Accountant require two distinct approvals)
post.description: Approve a booking by the currently logged-in user (role-based logic).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to approve

approval.description: Details of the newly created approval record

422.description: Validation error or duplicate approval from the same role

post.description: Store a newly created building in storage.

put.description: Update the specified building in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the building to update

delete.description: Remove the specified building from storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the building to delete

get.summary: Get a payment plan with its installments
get.description: Get a payment plan with its installments.

put.description: Update an existing custom payment plan.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the payment plan to update

delete.description: Delete a payment plan and its installments.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the payment plan to delete

get.summary: Get all payment plans for a unit
get.description: Get all payment plans for a given unit with their installments.

404.description: No payment plans found for this unit

post.description: Store a custom payment plan for a unit.

post.summary: Generate a sales offer PDF on the fly
post.description: Generate a Sales Offer PDF on the fly.

payment_plan_ids.description: Optional array of Payment Plan IDs to include

get.description: Display a listing of the units.

201.description: Unit created successfully with its payment plans

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the unit to update

floor_plan.description: Optional floor plan file (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the unit to delete

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the unit to approve

floor_plan.description: Optional floor plan file (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png)
